name: Night Fright Flight
description:
A Halloween endless runner! 

Featured at PAX East 2018 at the WPI IMGD booth!

Collect candy corn, phase through stuff, and in general be a ghost!

This was made over the course of October 2017 for the PICO-8 3-Color Jam. The jam's restrictions were to make something spooky and/or spoopy, and to use no more than 3 colors on-screen at once.

CONTROLS:

  • Arrows: Move
  • X: Continue/Phase Out

Notes: 

  • Phasing out makes you invincible and lets you pass through walls, but also drains energy.
  • Candy corn scores points and restores energy.
  • You can phase through the ground, but don't run out of energy or you'll be trapped!
  • You can change the color palette from the pause menu. There are 5 to pick from!

You can also play it here: https://www.lexaloffle.com/bbs/?tid=30133
